entry.title: Wind Advisory issued September 08 at 2:59PM AKDT until September 10 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS

entry.title: Flood Warning issued September 08 at 12:21PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A GLACIER-DAMMED LAKE OUTBURST REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by a glacier-dammed lake outburst continues. * WHERE...the Snow River near Snow River, Primrose Campground and Kenai Lake. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM AKDT Monday.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued September 08 at 11:56AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by glacial dammed lake release is expected. * WHERE...Cooper Landing through Skilak Lake * WHEN...Until 900 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring.

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued September 08 at 11:47AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...OZONE HIGH POLLUTION ADVISORY FOR MARICOPA COUNTY INCLUDING THE PHOENIX METRO AREA SATURDAY... The Arizona Department of Environmental Quality (ADEQ) has issued an Ozone High Pollution Advisory for the Phoenix Metro Area on Saturday. This means that forecast weather conditions combined with existing ozone levels are expected to result in local maximum 8-hour ozone
